enhanced_by.reason: The create method initializes a RectangleDouble instance, which is necessary for testing the add method.
The intersects method checks for intersection, which might be relevant for setting up test cases where the rectangles overlap.
The equals method can be used to assert that the resulting Rectangle from the add method is as expected.
The area method can be used to assert that the area of the resulting Rectangle from the add method is correctly calculated.
The GeometryUtil.intersects method can be used to assert that the resulting Rectangle from the add method correctly intersects with other rectangles.
